Writing New Transport Plugins
[Pluggable Transports]

Developing new transport plugins for RTI Data Distribution Service. More...

Classes

interface  Transport
 RTI Data Distribution Service's abstract pluggable transport interface. More...

Detailed Description

Developing new transport plugins for RTI Data Distribution Service.

RTI Data Distribution Service provides an abstract "C" language API for creating new transport plugins.

A transport plugin must provide:

  • an address mapping from its internal address scheme to address_bit_count <= 128 "significant bits".
  • a method to send messages to others in its transport network,
  • a blocking method to receive messages from others in its transport network.
Contact support@rti.com for details on how to write your own transport plugins for RTI Data Distribution Service.
